lead_paragraph: United States auto safety regulators have opened an investigation into complaints that doors on about 400,000 Ford Focus compact cars will not latch properly.

headline.print_headline: An Inquiry Into Car Doors That Don’t Close Securely
headline.main: An Inquiry Into Car Doors That Don’t Close Securely

snippet: United States auto safety regulators have opened an investigation into complaints that doors on about 400,000 Ford Focus compact cars will not latch properly.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration opens investigation into complaints that doors on around 400,000 Ford Focus cars produced from 2012 and 2013 are not closing properly.
